sentences.sContent: The report, released to mark International Women's Day, called for greater equality for women.
sentences.sContent_eng: The report, released to mark International Women's Day, called for greater equality for women.
sentences.sCn: 这一报告为纪念国际 妇女节 而发布，目的是呼吁性别平等。

sentences.sContent: This, perhaps, is the best commemoration of the centenary of the International Women's Day, and warmest greetings to women of the world!
sentences.sContent_eng: This, perhaps, is the best commemoration of the centenary of the International Women's Day, and warmest greetings to women of the world!
sentences.sCn: 或许，这才是对三八国际妇女节诞生一百周年最好的纪念，才是对世界各国妇女最为切实的节日祝愿！
